          <title>
            <string language="en">Poor diet and diseases</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Armediät und -krankheiten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Régime et maladies de pauvres</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dieta e doenças dos pobres</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Povera dieta e malattie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φτωχές διατροφή και ασθένειες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Dieta y enfermedades de los pobres</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that poor diet can cause diseases to the human body like poor eyesight, bad teeth, heart disease, anaemia and weak bones.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">disease</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">health</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bad teeth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heart disease</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">poor diet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">poor eyesight</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">weak bones</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß Armediät Krankheiten 
verursachen kann dem menschlichen Körper wie schlechtem Sehvermögen,
falscher Zahn-, Innererkrankheit, Anämie und schwachen Knochen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que le régime de 
pauvres peut causer les maladies au corps humain comme la vue faible, 
les mauvaises dents, la maladie de coeur, l'anémie et les os faibles.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que a dieta dos pobres 
pode causar doenças ao corpo humano como o eyesight deficiente, os 
dentes maus, a doença de coração, o anaemia e os ossos fracos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che la povera 
dieta può causare le malattie al corpo umano come povera vista, i
denti difettosi, la malattia di cuore, l'anemia e le ossa deboli.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι η φτωχή διατροφή 
μπορεί να προκαλέσει τις ασθένειες στο ανθρώπινο σώμα όπως τη 
φτωχή όραση, τα κακά δόντια, τις καρδιακές παθήσεις, την 
αναιμία και τα αδύνατα κόκκαλα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que la dieta de los 
pobres puede causar enfermedades al cuerpo humano como vista pobre, 
los malos dientes, enfermedad cardíaca, anemia y los huesos débiles.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
